long_description: This full-featured compass lets you take accurate bearings with a sighting notch and mirror, plus its patented Global needle works anywhere on earth. Baseplate features magnifying lens, straight edge and inch markings for accurate map reading. Declination scale is adjustable to account for the difference between magnetic and true North; adjustment key is included on lanyard. Easy-grip bezel reads in 2-degree increments and features luminous outer ring for low-light reading.
short_description: This full-featured compass lets you take accurate bearings with a sighting notch and mirror, plus its patented Global needle works anywhere on earth.
